message.content:
{"id": "18268", 
"title": "Not finding images and files in NL-specific subdirectories", 
"description": "When starting Eclipse and deleting <install/eclipse/org.eclipse.platform2.0.0/eclipselg.gif, and then modifying the about.ini file by changing the value of the aboutImage property to aboutImage=$nl$/eclipselg.gif, the UI correctly passes the entire path to IPluginDescriptor.find. However, it seems that the \"$nl$\" path segment is not being handled correctly, as the main image is not displayed in the about dialog.", 
"OB": "1. Open the about dialog.\n2. Observe: There should be a main image displayed.", 
"EB": "1. Exit Eclipse.\n2. Copy the file <install/eclipse/org.eclipse.platform2.0.0/eclipselg.gif to an NL-specific subdirectory, such as <install/eclipse/org.eclipse.platform2.0.0/nl/en/eclipselg.gif.\n3. Start Eclipse.", 
"SR": "The issue should be investigated and resolved to ensure that images and files in NL-specific subdirectories are found and displayed correctly."}

origin.input_prompt:
Your role is a senior software engineer, you are very good at analyzing and writing bug reports.
It is possible that the bug report may lack sufficient details in the OB, EB, and SR sections.  In such cases, your task is to infer the appropriate details based on the context and supplement the bug report to ensure it contains clear and complete OB/EB/SR statements.  Also, improve the wording of these statements for clarity where possible.
To facilitate this process, please provide your responses in JSON format as follows:
{"id": "", "title": "", "description": "", "OB": "", "EB": "", "SR": ""}
origin.input_content:
<BUG REPORT>
{'id': '18268', 'title': 'Bug 18268not finding images and files in NLspecific subdirectories', 'description': 'Bug 18268not finding images and files in NLspecific subdirectories build 200205291235Setup Start eclipse. Delete <install/eclipse/org.eclipse.platform2.0.0/eclipselg.gif3. Edit <install/eclipse/org.eclipse.platform2.0.0/about.iniChange the value of the aboutImage property:aboutImage=$nl$/eclipselg.gif4. Edit <install/eclipse/org.eclipse.platform2.0.0/about.iniChange the value of the aboutImage property:aboutImage=nl/en/eclipselg.gif7. Open the about dialogObserve: There is a main image again.This suggests that the UI is correctly passing the entire pathto IPluginDescriptor.find, but that the "$nl$" path segment is not beinghandled correctly. ', 'OB': 'Open the about dialog Observe: There is a main image. ', 'EB': '', 'SR': 'Exit eclipse.1. Copy the file <install/eclipse/org.eclipse.platform2.0.0/eclipselg.gifdown into an NLspecific subdirectory; i.e., move it to<install/eclipse/org.eclipse.platform2.0.0/nl/en/eclipselg.gif2. Start eclipse5. Start eclipse8. '}
